## Day 9 of \#30DayChartChallenge
Distributions: Statistics

```{r setup, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
require(ggdist)
require(distributional)
require(ggplot2)
```

```{r sim}
df = data.frame(
  name = c('Gamma(0.5, 0.5)', 'Gamma(1, 0.5)', 'Gamma(2, 0.5)', 'Gamma(5, 0.5)',
           'Gamma(0.5, 1)', 'Gamma(1, 1)', 'Gamma(2, 1)', 'Gamma(5, 1)',
           'Gamma(0.5, 2)', 'Gamma(1, 2)', 'Gamma(2, 2)', 'Gamma(5, 2)',
           'Gamma(0.5, 5)', 'Gamma(1, 5)', 'Gamma(2, 5)', 'Gamma(5, 5)'),
  dist = c(dist_gamma(.5,.5), dist_gamma(1,.5), dist_gamma(2,.5), dist_gamma(5,.5),
           dist_gamma(.5, 1), dist_gamma(1, 1), dist_gamma(2, 1), dist_gamma(5, 1),
           dist_gamma(.5, 2), dist_gamma(1, 2), dist_gamma(2, 2), dist_gamma(5, 2),
           dist_gamma(.5, 5), dist_gamma(1, 5), dist_gamma(2, 5), dist_gamma(5, 5))
)
ggplot(df, aes(y = factor(name))) +
  stat_dist_halfeye(aes(dist=dist)) +
  labs(title='Density plots')
           
  

# Beta


# Gamma
```
